Blog - page 75

  1. 82/365: Commuters

    02.04.2011

    The best I got from a few quick attempts before rushing onto my train home. Any more tries and I would have missed it.

  2. 81/365: DeLorean

    01.04.2011

    The model DeLorean I was given a few Christmases ago because of my love of Back to the Future.

    I think I could get some nice macro shots of the really cool little details on it, which I'm dying to do, as soon as I can sort out the issues I'm having with my extension tubes.

    01.04.2011

  4. 79/365: Red

    31.03.2011

    I'm quite pleased with this one too. It was a good weekend for photos; probably my best yet.

  5. 78/365: Sick!

    29.03.2011

    Day 78 was a success, I'd say, and produced one of my favourites so far. This was taken just a short walk from my house at Reddicth Skate & BMX park. There were loads of people there, and I got so many almost great photos of them mid-jump (including a few of them upside down, mid-flip), but they were all moving so quickly that they weren't completely in frame.

    Some of the guys wanted to see what pictures I took and they reliably informed me that they're sick photos. That means they liked them.

    I'm sure I'll be heading back there a couple more times before the project is up.

  6. 77/365

    27.03.2011
